Tyrael laughs. Surprisingly, it is not the kind of cruel laugh he let 
go when he executed Gorefeast.

Tyrael: Ah yes! That would probably place us near their heart! I think 
that for now, we will announce us as a neutral group and place 
ourselves in a position where we can strike at the Predacons hard and 
fast! (He glances at his timer) Naga should come out of CR soon enough 
and we must be on orbit by now. I think that we should land. I will 
leave you command of the landing, lieutenant. They are your troops 
too, after all. Meet us on the bridge when you are ready.

He comes out of the room and heads back to the bridge.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> We tell them that your an attempt to bring the day
> when "all are one" *chuckles* by creating new bodies,
> neither Maximal nor Predicon, that everybot can become
> without feeling one faction took over.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael: I think your idea has merit, but we would
> > need to find an 
> > excuse for me and Naga. We are, after all,
> > Techno-organics, and I 
> > doubt that the Maximals know about this.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > Shadow Star:  Should we come at the Maximals under
> > > cover of Alliance or as an enemy?
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Tyrael sat at his desk. As Shadow Star enters,
> > the
> > > > door automatically 
> > > > closes behind him (auto-doors, no tricks if you
> > > > ask).
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael:What I have to say has to remain between
> > us
> > > > only. I presume 
> > > > that Megatron has gone back to prehistoric Earth
> > and
> > > > that those 
> > > > foolish Maximals followed him. We have to remain
> > a
> > > > secret 
> > > > organization, and in this goal, we have to
> > eradicate
> > > > anyone who comes 
> > > > in contact with our group before we are to
> > leave.
> > > > Also, we have to 
> > > > learn what the Predacons are up to. I will leave
> > > > this to you. 
> > > > Questions?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > SS follows.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Tyrael: I have to speak with you, Shadow
> > Star.
> > > > > > Talon, find the third 
> > > > > > planet of this system and place us on high
> > > > orbit.
> > > > > > Report when you're 
> > > > > > done. Lieutenant, come in my office, please.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > The glowing robot walks away and into the
> > room
> > > > he
> > > > > > called his office. 
> > > > > > He waits for Shadow Star.
> > > > > >

> > > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > Shadow Star:  What about me?
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > wrote:
> > > > > > > > Tyrael: We are all good, as you can see.
> > I
> > > > > > suggest
> > > > > > > > that you go to the 
> > > > > > > > CR chamber for some times until we track
> > > > > > Megatron.
> > > > > > > > My theory should 
> > > > > > > > prove me right or wrong soon enough
> > about
> > > > this. 
> > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > wrote:

> > take

> > > > > > > > > about you and the others?" he said
> > while
> > > > > > getting
> > > > > > > > up.
